Translations.Text: Chernytsya, ruchka, ta yaki vony (lyudy) pyshutʹ
Vy dosyahnuly velykoho blahoslovennya z vashoho Lorda; vy ye ne bozhevilʹni
Vy dosyahnuly vynahorody shcho dobre zasluhovuyetʹsya
Vy blahoslovlyayetesʹ z velykoyu morallyu kharakter
Vy pobachyte, ta vony pobachatʹ
Kotryy vy zasudzhuyetesʹ
Vash Lord znaye tsilkom tsi khto zbylysya z shlyakhu Yoho shlyakh, ta Vin znaye tsilkom tsi khto keruyutʹsya
Ne pidkoryayutʹsya rejectors
Vony bazhayutʹ shcho vy komprometuyete, takym chynom vony nadto mozhutʹ pity na kompromys
Ne pidkoryayutʹsya kozhnomu nyzʹko swearer
slanderer, backbiter
Forbidder dobrodiynosti, porushnyka, hrishnyka
Unappreciative, ta zhadnyy
Nezvazhayuchy na te, shcho vin ovolodiv dosytʹ hroshovymy ta ditʹmy
Koly nashi vidkryttya deklamuyutʹsya yomu, vin kazhe, "Povisti z mynuli
My vidznachymo yoho oblychchya
My vyprobuvaly yikh lyubymo my vyprobuvaly vlasnykiv sadu khto prysyahnuvsya shcho vony zberutʹ urozhay tse u ranku
Vony perekonalysya tak absolyutno
vynesennya (shtorm) z vashoho Lorda proyshly povz tse v toy chas, yak vony spaly
Za dopomohoyu ranku, bulo bezplidno
Vony zaklykaly odyn odnoho u ranku
Dozvolyayutʹ nam zbyrayutʹ urozhay zerno
Na yikhnʹomu shlyakhu, vony doviryaly do odyn odnoho
Shcho z todi na, zhoden z nykh by ne buv bidni
Vony perekonalysya tak absolyutno yikhnʹoho urozhayu
Ale koly vony pobachyly tse, vony skazaly, "My buly tak nepravylʹni
Zaraz, my nichoho
spravedlyvyy sered nykh skazaly, "Yakby tilʹky vy glorified (Boh)
Vony skazaly, "Slava musytʹ nash Lord. My porushyly
Vony startuvaly osudyty odyn odnoho
Vony skazaly, "Prykroshchi do nas. My hrishyly
travenʹ nash Lord harantuyutʹ nam krashchyy. My kayemosya do nashoho Lorda
Takyy yavlyav soboyu requital. Ale retribution U maybutnʹomu daleko hirshyy, yakshcho vony tilʹky znaly
